item.title: 美国广播公司新闻记者 @tsoufiburridge 为您带来更多报道。
item.description:
Vladimir Putin claimed he was the winner in a state-managed election, where virtually all opposition leaders are in exile, jailed or dead.

ABC News' @tsoufiburridge has more. https://t.co/Tvu2fXtWrM pic.twitter.com/Q9AqmsyUQ6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 据英国《太阳报》报道，威尔士王妃凯特周末被拍到与威廉王子和他们的三个孩子在一起。阅读更多
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, was reportedly spotted with Prince William and their three children over the weekend, according to the U.K.'s The Sun newspaper.

No photographs were shared of Kate out and about in her day-to-day life. Read more: https://t.co/BfiNLaGIUq pic.twitter.com/IyVT4Ibfup

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 据英国《太阳报》报道，威尔士王妃凯特周末被拍到与威廉王子和他们的三个孩子在一起，而有关她的健康和福祉的问题仍在持续发酵。
item.description:
Kate, the Princess of Wales, was reportedly spotted with Prince William and their three children over the weekend as questions continue to swirl about her health and well-being, according to the U.K.'s The Sun newspaper. https://t.co/PiOnXu4kpF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 其中一名医生说，韩国当局已吊销了两名资深医生的执照，原因是他们涉嫌煽动实习医生和住院医生举行长达数周的游行，导致医院运营中断。
item.description:
South Korean authorities have suspended the licenses of two senior doctors for allegedly inciting the weekslong walkouts by medical interns and residents that have disrupted hospital operations, one of the doctors said. https://t.co/FuculylxXL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，周日晚间，佛罗里达州杰克逊维尔海滩在一小时内发生了三起互不相关的枪击事件，造成一人死亡，数人受伤。
item.description:
Three separate, unrelated shootings erupted within an hour in Jacksonville Beach, Florida, on Sunday night, leaving one person dead and several hurt, according to authorities. https://t.co/Za6fmc6omK pic.twitter.com/C7hD4iPN2H

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 织物和工艺品零售商 Joann 已申请破产保护。该公司在一份新闻稿中表示，预计最早将于下月底摆脱破产。
item.description:
Fabric and crafts retailer Joann has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection.

In a release, the company said that it expected to emerge from bankruptcy as early as the end of next month. https://t.co/9vg7cimjIe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国前总统特朗普的律师表示，他在获得保释金以履行 4.64 亿美元的民事欺诈判决方面正面临 "难以克服的困难"。
item.description:
BREAKING: Former Pres. Trump is facing "insurmountable difficulties" in obtaining a bond to satisfy the $464 million civil fraud judgment, his attorneys said. https://t.co/XoenT1BDNQ pic.twitter.com/Jxn7RhIGUn

item.title: 冰岛气象局称，上周末开始的火山爆发使 "大片熔岩 "流向格林达维克镇的保护屏障。
item.description:

item.title: 周一，当热气球从澳大利亚第二大城市墨尔本郊区上空飞过时，一名男子从热气球上坠落身亡。
item.description:

item.title: Dollar Tree 计划在 2024 财年上半年关闭 600 家 Family Dollar 门店。在接下来的几年里，该公司打算再关闭 370 家 Family Dollar 门店和 30 家 Dollar Tree 门店。
item.description:
Dollar Tree plans to shutter 600 Family Dollar stores in the first half of fiscal 2024. Over the next several years, the company intends to close 370 more Family Dollar locations, as well as 30 Dollar Tree stores. https://t.co/4gZIH0fbyg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在特拉布宗体育主场不敌费内巴切的比赛结束后，特拉布宗体育俱乐部的球迷侵入球场，引发了球迷与客队球员之间的暴力冲突，土耳其警方拘留了 12 人。
item.description:
Turkish police have detained 12 people after fans of top tier soccer club Trabzonspor invaded the pitch following a home loss against Fenerbahce, touching off violent scuffles between the fans and visiting players. https://t.co/E5uqshTHHx pic.twitter.com/10LCdXJzpP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 爱达荷州的立法者预计将就一项法案进行投票，该法案将禁止使用任何公共资金进行性别确认护理，包括使用工作医疗保险的州雇员和医疗补助计划（Medicaid）覆盖的成年人。
item.description:
Idaho lawmakers are expected to vote on a bill that would ban the use of any public funds for gender-affirming care, including for state employees using work health insurance and for adults covered by Medicaid. https://t.co/WFaPpu9AA8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 罗德岛州州长丹-麦基（Dan McKee）表示，罗德岛的一座重要桥梁因安全问题于 12 月部分关闭，将需要拆除并更换。
item.description:
A critical Rhode Island bridge that was partially shut down over safety concerns in December will need to be demolished and replaced, Gov. Dan McKee said. https://t.co/DqSaZkRgrd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在气候变化、人口增长和耐药性的推动下，真菌感染的危险性正在不断增加，美国疾病预防控制中心和世界卫生组织发出的新警告更是强化了这一点。
item.description:
Driven by climate change, population growth, and drug resistance, the danger of fungal infections is growing, reinforced by new warnings from the CDC and WHO. https://t.co/wX2iOc92KN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 克里斯汀-韦格（Kristen Wiig）回忆了她在生双胞胎之前的试管婴儿之旅："感觉没有多少人谈论这件事"。
item.description:
Kristen Wiig recalls her "struggle" with her IVF journey before having her twins: "It feels like not a lot of people talk about it." https://t.co/Mt9vqEzIxz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在参议员舒默呼吁在以色列举行新的选举之后，白宫的约翰-柯比告诉 @MarthaRaddatz 说，"如果要举行新的选举，这将由他们选出的以色列政府来决定是否以及如何举行新的选举"。
item.description:
After Sen. Schumer calls for new elections in Israel, White House’s John Kirby tells @MarthaRaddatz that it’s “up to the Israeli government that they elect to determine whether and how, if there's going to be new elections, what that would look like.” https://t.co/zsfFxOoTxb pic.twitter.com/ID5kboq8ax

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 将标准工作周从 40 小时减少到 32 小时的提案本周取得了突破性进展，在参议院站稳了脚跟，该提案要求企业提供 32 小时工作周，但保留员工工资：
item.description:
A push to slash the standard workweek from 40 hours to 32 achieved a breakthrough this week, gaining a foothold in the Senate with a proposal that would require businesses to offer the 32-hour workweek but preserve employee pay.

Read more: https://t.co/SaAYfqn9fC pic.twitter.com/KvaAcsxcDL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 美国联邦调查局（FBI）称，在马萨诸塞州的一个家庭从已故父亲的私人物品中发现了 22 件在二战冲绳战役后被掠夺的历史文物后，这些文物已被归还日本。
item.description:
Twenty-two historic artifacts that were looted following the Battle of Okinawa in World War II have been returned to Japan after a family from Massachusetts discovered them in their late father’s personal items, the FBI said. https://t.co/VBHWBFIZdx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024
